name: Shortcut Adventures (BETA)
description: Well, This game is a game where a villain wants to take over the world using shortcuts, the villan's name is the Dark shortcut master, by destroying the Shortcut crystals in each world, the glitches get closer, meaning the dark shortcut master is gettin nearer and nearer, once all crystals are destroyed, the dark shortcut master will lose all power, in order to do this you must get quests from the TopHat Man! (This game isnt a game, its just a preview of it, but there is graphics and music once u play.) Please Comment if there are any problems with the downloading and you can correct me with what i should upload, this is my second time publishing a game, and this is a submission to the What-A-Jam aswell! This game is created by the What-a-team, enjoy your day and the game :)
